Help.Description:
Logs all data received in the scrolling region to the specified filename. The mode is either 'o' (ovewrite) or 'a' (append).
With the '#config' command, you can specify the data type used for the log file. These are: raw - (includes escape codes) plain - (strips escape codes) html - (converts escape color codes to html color codes)
Help.Example: Writes all output to the 'mylog.html' file in HTML format as the default.
